events.name: Russian rocket attack on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_label: Russian rocket attack on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_description: A Russian rocket hit the town of Chasiv Yar in Eastern Ukraine, destroying a five-story apartment building and killing at least six people.
events.description: A Russian rocket hit the town of Chasiv Yar in Eastern Ukraine, destroying a five-story apartment building and killing at least six people.

events.name: rocket attack
events.wd_description: The town of Chasiv Yar was hit by Uragan rockets from truck-borne systems, launched by Russian forces.
events.description: The town of Chasiv Yar was hit by Uragan rockets from truck-borne systems, launched by Russian forces.

events.name: impact on Chasiv Yar
events.wd_description: The rocket attack destroyed a five-story apartment building in Chasiv Yar, resulting in at least six deaths.
events.description: The rocket attack destroyed a five-story apartment building in Chasiv Yar, resulting in at least six deaths.

events.name: regional context
events.wd_description: Chasiv Yar, located in the Donetsk region, is expected to be an essential target for Russian forces as they advance westward; the Donetsk and Luhansk regions make up the Donbas area, a focal point of conflict since 2014.
events.description: Chasiv Yar, located in the Donetsk region, is expected to be an essential target for Russian forces as they advance westward; the Donetsk and Luhansk regions make up the Donbas area, a focal point of conflict since 2014.

events.name: UN nuclear disarmament meeting fails due to Russia's refusal
events.wd_label: UN nuclear disarmament meeting fails due to Russia's refusal
events.wd_description: A UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons, aimed at reducing nuclear risks and stopping the expansion of nuclear arsenals.
events.description: A UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons, aimed at reducing nuclear risks and stopping the expansion of nuclear arsenals.

events.name: meeting failure
events.wd_description: The UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
events.description: The UN meeting on nuclear disarmament failed after Russia refused to accept the final draft of the treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

events.name: treaty review
events.wd_description: The treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons is reviewed every five years as part of efforts to reduce nuclear risks and stop the expansion of nuclear arsenals.
events.description: The treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons is reviewed every five years as part of efforts to reduce nuclear risks and stop the expansion of nuclear arsenals.

events.name: Russia's attempts to amend treaty
events.wd_description: UN Ambassador Gustavo Zlauvinen stated that Russia attempted to amend the treaty, which would have caused chaos at this late stage in the negotiations.
events.description: UN Ambassador Gustavo Zlauvinen stated that Russia attempted to amend the treaty, which would have caused chaos at this late stage in the negotiations.

events.name: reactions to the failure
events.wd_description: Beatrice Fihn, the group's Executive Director, criticized the failure, stating that it is a total abdication of responsibility and noting that nuclear-armed states have spent over $82 billion on maintaining their arsenals without making progress on disarmament.
events.description: Beatrice Fihn, the group's Executive Director, criticized the failure, stating that it is a total abdication of responsibility and noting that nuclear-armed states have spent over $82 billion on maintaining their arsenals without making progress on disarmament.

events.name: India arrests mastermind behind shell companies linked to China
events.wd_label: India arrests mastermind behind shell companies linked to China
events.wd_description: Indian authorities arrested a man who masterminded the creation of numerous shell companies linked with China, appointing dummy directors to run fraudulent businesses.
events.description: Indian authorities arrested a man who masterminded the creation of numerous shell companies linked with China, appointing dummy directors to run fraudulent businesses.

events.name: SFIO investigation
events.wd_description: The Serious Fraud Investigation Office (SFIO) launched a probe against the founders of shell companies used for illegal transactions.
events.description: The Serious Fraud Investigation Office (SFIO) launched a probe against the founders of shell companies used for illegal transactions.

events.name: arrest of Dortse
events.wd_description: SFIO arrested Dortse, who was on the board of Jillian India Ltd, a subsidiary of Jillian Hong Kong Ltd, and was linked to the shell companies.
events.description: SFIO arrested Dortse, who was on the board of Jillian India Ltd, a subsidiary of Jillian Hong Kong Ltd, and was linked to the shell companies.

events.name: raids to uncover scam
events.wd_description: SFIO conducted multiple raids to uncover the scam involving shell companies linked to China.
events.description: SFIO conducted multiple raids to uncover the scam involving shell companies linked to China.

events.name: previous arrests
events.wd_description: Two company directors, including a Chinese national, were previously arrested by local police for their involvement in providing dummy directors to shell companies linked to China.
events.description: Two company directors, including a Chinese national, were previously arrested by local police for their involvement in providing dummy directors to shell companies linked to China.

events.name: Ford's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_label: Ford's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_description: Ford is enhancing its battery supply chain by incorporating lower-cost, iron-based batteries from China and securing raw material supplies to boost electric vehicle production.
events.description: Ford is enhancing its battery supply chain by incorporating lower-cost, iron-based batteries from China and securing raw material supplies to boost electric vehicle production.

events.name: short-term goals
events.wd_description: Ford aims to produce 600,000 EVs annually by 2023, supported by its strategy to use cheaper and more abundant LFP batteries.
events.description: Ford aims to produce 600,000 EVs annually by 2023, supported by its strategy to use cheaper and more abundant LFP batteries.

events.name: t: increasing EV production
events.wd_description: Ford plans to increase its EV production from 27,140 units to 600,000 units annually by 2023.
events.description: Ford plans to increase its EV production from 27,140 units to 600,000 units annually by 2023.

events.name: t: importing LFP batteries
events.wd_description: Ford will import LFP battery packs from China’s CATL for its Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning starting next year.
events.description: Ford will import LFP battery packs from China’s CATL for its Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning starting next year.

events.name: long-term goals
events.wd_description: Ford aims to produce 2 million EVs annually by 2026, with plans to establish a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America and reduce reliance on nickel and cobalt-based batteries.
events.description: Ford aims to produce 2 million EVs annually by 2026, with plans to establish a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America and reduce reliance on nickel and cobalt-based batteries.

events.name: t: domestic LFP production
events.wd_description: Ford plans to open a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America by 2026.
events.description: Ford plans to open a 40-GWh LFP cell factory in North America by 2026.

events.name: t: reducing reliance on nickel and cobalt
events.wd_label: t: reducing reliance on nickel and cobalt
events.wd_description: Ford is shifting to iron-based LFP batteries to avoid supply issues related to nickel and cobalt.
events.description: Ford is shifting to iron-based LFP batteries to avoid supply issues related to nickel and cobalt.

events.name: supplier deals and partnerships
events.wd_description: Ford has announced several supplier deals and partnerships to secure raw materials and battery components directly from mining companies.
events.description: Ford has announced several supplier deals and partnerships to secure raw materials and battery components directly from mining companies.

events.name: t: direct sourcing from mining companies
events.wd_label: t: direct sourcing from mining companies
events.wd_description: Ford has secured contracts to buy raw materials directly from mining companies to ensure a steady supply for battery production.
events.description: Ford has secured contracts to buy raw materials directly from mining companies to ensure a steady supply for battery production.

events.name: t: diversification of battery chemistry
events.wd_description: Ford is adding LFP battery chemistry alongside its existing NCM chemistry to diversify its battery options and reduce costs.
events.description: Ford is adding LFP battery chemistry alongside its existing NCM chemistry to diversify its battery options and reduce costs.
